SEARCH
Package com.raylib.jextract

Class GlyphInfo

java.lang.Object
com.raylib.jextract.GlyphInfo
public class GlyphInfo extends Object
struct GlyphInfo {
    int value;
    int offsetX;
    int offsetY;
    int advanceX;
    Image image;
}
